name: Password Generator
description: This passwaord generator generate a password with criteria that user chose. The length of password is at least 8 characters and no more than 128 characters. The user can choose lowercase, uppercase, numeric and/or special characters.

name: JavaScript Quiz
description: Test what you have learned! There are 5 questions and your time limit is 60 seconds.

name: Workday Scheduler
description: You can add/edit to-do list hourly from 0900 to 1700. Even after refresing your page, it will store the list.It will show the past, present, future in different colors.

name: Weather Forecast
description: Pick the city and check the weather!!

name: Hike the Trail
description: This website dynamically generates up to 20 Austin trails in a list for you to click through. If needed, a user can select criteria to limit the trails, either based on length of the trail or on the difficutly of the trail. Once a trail is clicked on, the webpage dynamically updates with the a picture of the trail, trail information, and the location on Google Maps.

name: Employee Summary
description: The dependencies are, jest for running the provided tests, and inquirer for collecting input from the user. Please check https://github.com/jiji-smith/Employee-Summary.git

name: Note Taker
description: You can add and delete your note through localhost with express.

name: Employee Tracker
description: You can track employees information, using SQL

name: Eat Da Burger!
description: Eat-Da-Burger! is a restaurant app that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat. Whenever a user submits a burger's name, your app will display the burger on the left side of the page -- waiting to be devoured.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: A consumer will reach their fitness goals more quickly when they track their workout progress.

name: User Directory
description: you can clone the code and play in your localhost! you can find users by searching their first name

name: Book Club
description: A website that allows users to search for their favorite or least favorite books, leave reviews, and rate other reviews.
